entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SegFault while trying to Copy native test components in monointerpreter test run build #67405
  • Incorrect JsonException.Path when using non-leaf custom JsonConverters #67403
  • HttpClient crashes android app when trimmed #67402
    6.0.x
  • Methods JITed during startup #67398
  • [API Proposal]: Task.WhenAll(... CancellationToken) #67392
  • `IServiceScopeFactory` is Documented Assumed to be a Singleton #67391
  • Support custom type generated marshalling on prior to net7 tfms #67390
  • [API Proposal]: Boolean format strings #67388
  • Packages that depended on the latest version of System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe regressed and use a very old version of Unsafe now #67380
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Adopt msquic generated interop layer #67377
    7.0.0
  • [ARM64] Consider using LDAPR to implement volatile reads when instruction is available. #67374
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop\\IJW\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #67372
  • DataContract and derived types missing Equals implementation #67371

Closed

  • TryAdd* extensions compare based on service, not implementation #67404
  • [Apple ARM64] dotnet crashing when debugging in .NET 7 (7.0.100-preview.2.22101.4) #65341
    7.0.0
  • My Razor server fails to start with openssl3 #67375
    Future
  • VS debugger hangs when clicking on any button in WinformsControlsTest #65664
    7.0.0
  • ChainedConfigurationProvider.GetChildKeys is inefficient #62510
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Wrong exception for Open*Stream after connection is closed #56133
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [ReadOnly]Span<T>.CreateUnsafe(ref T, int) for compiler-tracked, arbitrary length spans #67242
  • Cannot deserialize an immutable collection #67361
  • IP protocol implementations which work in Windows do not work in Linux #67303
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Cancellation_Test_Http2.Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #66632
    7.0.0
  • Android test failed with DEVICE_NOT_FOUND #67032
  • CreateXHarnessAppleWorkItems task failed unexpectedly when building iOS arm64 AllSubsets_Mono #67349
  • MissingMethodException: The method 'System.Void System.IO.Packaging.Package::.cctor()' has no implementation. #67079
  • Test failure: GetResponseAsync_UseDefaultCredentials_ExpectSuccess #58349
    Future
  • Bounds checks on array/span not eliminated after length check #10596
    Future
  • Unrecognized X509VerifyStatusCode:Interop+Crypto+X509VerifyStatusCode on RHEL 9/OpenSSL 3.0 #67304
  • Review Apple Silicon PAL tests disabled by #47919 #48783
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Removed the hard heap limit heap balancing logic for regions + UOH and fixed infinite retries in case at the LOH boundary #67406
    area-GC-coreclr
  • More XARCH `PUTARG_STK` CQ improvements #67400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a thread pool test #67399
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Bump Intellisense to Preview2 #67396
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Optimize `ValueNumStore::GetVNFunc` #67395
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Infra fixes for bugs uncovered by testing of the JIT/Methodical merged tests #67393
    area-Infrastructure
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Bring back direct dependencies on System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe for other tfms than net7.0 #67385
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Update to msquic 2 #67383
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • First commit for ppc64le support #67378
    area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Some test fixes #67373
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix IsPrefix and IsSuffix with ignored characters #67370
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Add RemoteExecutor check in TestWaitForExitValidation #67397
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Makes GetChildKeys more efficient #67186
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Fix ordering in default interface method lookup #67379
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Mark architecture-specific tests as requiring process isolation #67394
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix missing side effect flags on HWI nodes #67206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Account for global stores in hoisting properly #67213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Wrong exception for Open*Stream after connection is closed #67342
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Port Access violation occurring in System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation fix from .netfx to .net-core #66726
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an assert with --aot=llvmonly and -O=gsharedvt. #67357
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Minor refactoring in MarshallingAttributeInfoParser #67325
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Always commit X.509 chain before Finish #67350
    area-System.Security
  • Fix a PAL filemapping test for macOS arm64 #67352
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Disable test45929 for win-arm64 #67363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable all StructABI tests in pri-0 #67362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 and x86 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-manual pipeline #67312
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Additional changes to merged test runners #67367
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update maui iOS build sed command #67263
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Make the cross-component build just another invocation of the build-runtime script #67108
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve handling of common Regex sets #67365
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Refactor JsonSerializer metadata reading infrastructure #67183
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #67226
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #67291
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #67125
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66958
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.5
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Call SendResettableCompletionSource.CompleteException in AbortWrite #67341
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch (#65625) #65700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Detect systemd when inside a container. #67288
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Fix System.DirectoryServices.Protocols to work on Linux #67338
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Double Vector128 for SpanHelpers.IndexOf(byte,byte,int) on ARM64 #66993
    area-System.Memory
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Added the option to get the compiler version from Crossgen2 #67317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
